casebody.data:
Louis P. HYMAN, Bankrupt, v. H. M. KESSLER, Trustee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. June 29, 1938. D. A. Sachs, Jr., of Louisville, Ky., for appellant.

*1006Before BUCKS, ALLEN, and HAMILTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

It appearing to the court that an appeal was allowed in this case on October 9, 1936, and that no further steps have been taken since that date to prosecute appeal; it is Ordered that the appeal be dismissed.
